metadata.title: CVE-2018-0492 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description:
Johnathan Nightingale beep through 1.3.4, if setuid, has a race conditionthat allows local privilege escalation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0492` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

beep - 1.3-3+deb8u1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: beep package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3-3+deb8u1build0.14.04.1').
